articles.author: Morgan Sloss
articles.title: KJ Apa Is Now A Samoan Chief, And I'm So Proud Of Him
articles.description: The New Zealand–born actor is Samoan on his father's side. The chiefs reportedly commended his decision to "take on this step in accepting his Samoan heritage and culture as well as his new responsibilities."
